name: pcdqb
short_description:
This program is the implementation of the method proposed in the paper Point-Based Manifold Harmonics.

Acknowledgement:

This program is inspired greatly by the source code and help provided by Dr. Jian Sun (http://www.geomtop.org/sunjian/). Dependency:

-BOOST C++ Library http://www.boost.org/ -LAPACK/BLAS http://www.netlib.org/lapack/ -CGAL http://www.cgal.org/ --GMP http://gmplib.org/ --MPFR http://www.mpfr.org/

Successfully compiled using MinGW GCC 4.5.2 with CGAL 3.8, Boost 1.46.1, GMP 5.0.1, MPFR 3.0.1. Also known to be working with MinGW-W64. It should work on most windows system.
summary: pcdqb as in paper Point-Based Manifold Harmonics
